alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 11:03AM EDT until May 23 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Northern Aiken County in central South Carolina... Saluda County in central South Carolina... * Until 1130 AM EDT. * At 1102 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Edgefield County Airport, or 9 miles northeast of Belvedere, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Aiken, Batesburg-Leesville, Aiken Mall, Edgefield, Saluda, Johnston, Ridge Spring, USC Aiken, Saluda County Airport, Edgefield County Airport, Citizens Park, Aiken Municipal Airport, Graniteville, Gloverville, Wagener, Monetta, Trenton, Ward, Strom Thurmond High School and Saluda Co Sheriff`s Office. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 11 and 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
